post.author: 권 경화
post.content:
The company I am working at is looking to hire additional developers for new project.
Position : Programmer(intermediate/senior level)
Java, J2EE, JSP/Servlet, RMI, JMS Oracle, HTML, JDBC Application Server(jBoss, IBM Websphere or BEA Weblogic) Telecommunication
If you are a good fit and interested in this position, please forward your resume to me. I will arrange to setup an interview.
fkwon@mobiledx.com www.mobiledx.com
post.title: Looking for Java Developers
